title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: When reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is no longer displayed. However, the bookmark is still saved in the xml source.
EB: The target bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog, even after it has been reopened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a bookmark link in a drill through link. 
2. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog. 
3. Observe that the selected bookmark is no longer displayed.
